channel.title: Streaming Services on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:46 Chances: Disney stock is riskier – and more expensive – than this analyst seems to believe. Meta Platforms (META), Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG), Walt Disney (DIS), Consolidated Edison (ED) and S&P Global (SPGI) could make great plays as Q1 earnings unfold. A lot more people are watching ‘Wish’ on Disney+ than the weak turnout at the multiplex late last year.
